casebody.data:
IN RE JOHN D. ET AL.* (AC 21087)

Lavery, C. X, and Flynn and Shea, Js.

Argued May 2 officially released May 22, 2001

In accordance with the spirit and intent of General Statutes § 46b-142 (b) and Practice Book § 79-3, the names of the parties involved in this appeal axe not disclosed. The records and papers of this case shall be open for inspection only to persons having a proper interest therein and upon order of the Appellate Court.

 *905Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
